body_html:
I was trying to execute that in a gtx 660 and it does not work. Now in a gtx 1060 and it works.
If you can tell me where is the cuda kernel that performs the topk operation, maybe I can modify it locally to make it work faster.
Thanks for your attention.

body:
I was trying to execute that in a gtx 660 and it does not work. Now in a gtx 1060 and it works. 
If you can tell me where is the cuda kernel that performs the topk operation, maybe I can modify it locally to make it work faster.
Thanks for your attention.
